statements: DELETE FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = '98765432-1234-5678-9123-456789123456' AND interaction_type = 'Email';
DELETE FROM Customer_Interactions WHERE interaction_id = 1 AND customer_id = 10;
DELETE FROM Customer_Communications WHERE communication_type = 'Email' AND communication_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM Customer_Interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Call' AND interaction_description LIKE '%complaint%';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 123 AND email = 'example@email.com';
DELETE FROM interactions WHERE interaction_id IN (SELECT interaction_id FROM customers c JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE c.customer_name = 'John Doe');
DELETE FROM communications WHERE communication_type = 'Email' AND communication_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Communications WHERE communication_type = 'Email' AND communication_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Interactions WHERE interaction_date < '2021-01-01');
DELETE FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = (SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe');
DELETE FROM communications WHERE interaction_id IN (SELECT interaction_id FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Call');
